com.ubtrobot.mini.speech.framework.demo

Class SpeechService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ubtrobot.mini.speech.framework.demo.SpeechService

  • public class SpeechService
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which includes the three processes of speech service (speech recognition, text generation and speech synthesis).
